scripts.db:console: docker compose run postgres psql -h postgres -U postgres -d webapp_dev
scripts.docker:db:migrate: docker compose run backend yarn db:migrate
scripts.docker:db:migrate:undo: docker compose run backend yarn prisma migrate reset
scripts.docker:seed:dev: docker compose run backend yarn ts-node scripts/seed/dev.ts
scripts.rebuild:be: docker compose build backend && docker compose rm --force --stop backend && docker compose up -d backend
scripts.doall: yarn docker:db:migrate && yarn docker:seed:dev && yarn rebuild:be
